params.totalAssets_: amount of assets in the lending

returns.ended_: flag to signal that rewards have ended (always 0 going forward)
returns.rate_: rewards rate percentage per year with 1e12 RATE_PRECISION, e.g. 1e12 = 1%, 1e14 = 100%
returns.startTime_: start time of rewards to compare against last update timestamp

getConfig().notice: Returns config constants for rewards rate model
